column3: Total number of persons in custody or on bail during the stage of investigation including persons under arrest carried over from previous year
column4: Total number of persons in custody or on bail during the stage of investigation at the end of the year
column5: Persons in whose cases chargesheets were laid during the year
column6: Percentage of persons in custody or on bail during the stage of investigation pending at the end of the year to total persons during the stage of investigation
column7: Percentage of persons in whose cases chargesheets were laid to total persons under custody or on bail during the stage of investigation
